body_html: Group convolution is implemented in both Caffe and PyTorch. As now it slows down the inference stage when I reproduce them with tf.split and tf.concat, I think it's reasonable enough to be added as TF kernel.
body_text: Group  convolution is implemented in both Caffe and PyTorch. As now it slows down the inference stage when I reproduce them with tf.split and tf.concat, I think it's reasonable enough to be added as TF kernel.
body: Group  convolution is implemented in both Caffe and PyTorch. As now it slows down the inference stage when I reproduce them with `tf.split` and `tf.concat`, I think it's reasonable enough to be added as TF kernel.
